==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Caua:''' Whoa, that's a lot of vegetables. You're not looking for me to deliver them, are you?
:'''Tamal:''' That's right! What do you say, Caua, these are some quality vegetables, right?
:'''Caua:''' The veggie best... but my expertise lies more in delivering letters, transporting vegetables really isn't part of my job description...
:'''Caua:''' *sigh* What am I saying? I end up delivering these things every time I come here anyway... Fine, load them onto my [[saurian]] friend over there and leave the rest to us.
:'''Tamal:''' Haha, that's the Caua I know, reliable as always! Thanks again for your help!
{{Dialogue End}}
